summary: *XXX* is an action-packed American spy film that came out in 2002. It stars Vin Diesel as Xander Cage, a brave and rebellious extreme sports enthusiast who becomes a spy for the NSA. In the movie, Cage goes on a secret mission to stop Russian terrorists in Central Europe. The film was directed by Rob Cohen and produced by Neal H. Moritz, who also worked together on the fast-paced car movie, *The Fast and the Furious*. With its exciting stunts and popular cast, including Asia Argento and Samuel L. Jackson, *XXX* was a hit, making two sequels and lots of excitement for fans.
title: XXX (2002 film)
